title: go yacc emits line directives/comments despite -l flag set
body:
The yacc command emits line directives even when -l flag is set.

Please take a look at
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/cmd/yacc/yacc.go?r=b0d920685dda29c3e7b60056d52abfd760a98597

Some "fmt.Fprintf(ftable, "\n//line..." are not surrounded by "if
!lflag { ... }".

Since this is just a small fix would be great if we can get this into the Go 1.1 release.
